extensionDescription.message: Organize frequently visited sites in a convenient menu of visual bookmarks and folders instead of a blank browser page. You can quickly open a bookmark or folder from any other tab using keyboard shortcuts.

elemsWillBeLost.message: Content of cells with number bigger than $1 will be irretrievably lost ($2 bookmark$3, $4 folder$5)

errMsg.message: Operation was interrupted due to error

rlyDeleteElement.message: Do you really want to delete element №$1 ($2)?

elementIsNotFound.message: There is nothing at this address

kbdNavHints.message:
0-9 → dialing
+ or - → look over elements
/ or SPACE → separator
BACKSPACE → erase
SHIFT → open in a new tab

rootFolderSettingsDesc.message: Parameters of main folder, that just displayed on a new empty tab.

newTabFocusSettings.message: Focus capturing on a new tab

newTabFocusSettingsDesc.message:
This parameter defines where must be focus when a new empty tab is open.
If focus is on the page, you can immediately use the keyboard navigation (Ctrl+<bookmark/folder address>).
If focus is on the address bar, you can immediately enter addres of some page. To use keyboard navigation you are to click anywhere on the page before.

newTabActiveSettings.message: Behaviour when open a new tab with shortcut Ctrl+Shift+<address>

newTabActiveYes.message: Go to a new tab immediately

newTabActiveNo.message: Open a new tab, but stay on current

rlyRestoreRootFolderForm.message: Do you really want to restore root folder settings form? Fields will be filled with current values.

structureManagingDesc.message: Here you can store bookmarks structure into cloud or onto disk, or load what you've stored before. With cloud you can synchronize bookmarks structure between devices on which you logged into the same Firefox account. (Bookmarks previews and folders backgrounds won't be saved in cloud because of space limitation)

rlyOverwriteCurrStructure.message: Do you really want to overwrite current bookmarks structure?

rlyOverwriteRemoteStructure.message: Do you really want to overwrite bookmarks structure in cloud?

noStructureInSync.message: No bookmarks structure found in cloud

historyPermission.message: Access browsing history - when you will enter bookmark's URL, there will be suggested variants from browsing history

tabHidePermission.message: Hide and show browser tabs - when you're creating or updating bookmarks, request pages info (title, icon, preview screenshot) will be carried out without displaying a new tab on the tabs panel
